      • coreference

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> coreference(java.lang.String text)
        Does coreferencing using the Coreference option of the CoreNLP tool.
        Parameters:
        text - the text input to use
        Returns:
        Returns the coreference map resulted from coreferencing

      • doTest

        private java.lang.String doTest(java.lang.String text)
        Replaces the common noun (e.g. he, she) with coreferenced the proper noun (e.g. John, Joy), if the CoreNLP tool identifies the coreference.

        (e.g. “John went to the park, he ate an apple.” -> “John went to the park, John ate an apple.”)
        Parameters:
        text - Text to do coreference replacement on.
        Returns:
        coreference replacement text resulted from preprocessing
